name: #0006 THE TAX REAPER
description:
#0006 THE TAX REAPER (1/1) 🟦🟥
	•	Quantity: 1/1 (Unique, singular, unavoidable)
	•	Phase: Eternal Collection
	•	Rarity: Unavoidable

💀 The only entity that always gets paid.
💰 Every $ADRIAN transaction pays tribute to The Tax Reaper.
⚖️ It doesn’t earn, it collects.

🌀 Holders of this NFT receive a percentage of the ADRIAN tax—forever.
🔄 But the moment it is transferred, the new owner inherits all future earnings.
☠ One reaper falls, another rises. The cycle never ends.

Be real. Be relentless. Be The Reaper. 💀🔥
